text: Romeo is Bleeding is a melodramatic 1993 crime movie. Annabella Sciorra plays Natalie, Gary Oldman plays Jack and Juliette Lewis plays Sheri. The movie is about activities by the Mafia and corrupt officers. This movie was released in 1994 in United States theaters. Reviews of Romeo is Bleeding were very bad. The movie performed very badly in the box office. Category:1993 crime thriller movies Category:1990s English-language movies
title: Romeo Is Bleeding
